uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.table

Class DataBaseHandlerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.table.DataBaseHandlerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<DataBaseHandlerService>, Contexed

    public class DataBaseHandlerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Contexed, AppContextService<DataBaseHandlerService>
    Handler class for database level (as opposed to table level) operations Currently this implementation is tied to MySQL. Make this class abstract and introduce a sub-type to work with other DB implementations.
    Author:
    spb
